Financial: Military retirement pay exclusion from state income tax
Veterans preference in state employment (5 additional points)
North Dakota Department of Veterans Affairs emergency assistance
Small business development programs for veterans
Education: North Dakota Free Tuition for Veterans - full tuition waiver at state schools
Scholarships for dependents of disabled/deceased veterans
In-state tuition for veterans using GI Bill
North Dakota National Guard tuition assistance
Recreation: Free hunting and fishing licenses for 100% disabled veterans
State park vehicle permits for disabled veterans
Housing: Disabled Veterans Property Tax Credit - up to ,400 for 100% disabled
North Dakota Housing Finance Agency veteran programs
Property tax exemption for surviving spouses
Other: Stand Down events for homeless veterans
